title: Is Any Mutual Fund Company Better Than Vanguard? 1 Comes Close.
text:
It’s tough to beat Vanguard. But if anyone can do it, it might be Dodge & Cox.

A boutique fund company based in San Francisco, Dodge & Cox took the top spot in Morningstar’s latest ranking of 150 mutual fund companies. The rankings are based on a variety of factors, including analyst fund ratings, expense ratios, and corporate stewardship. Most important for investors, almost all Dodge & Cox mutual funds beat their category averages over the last decade—and outperformed comparable Vanguard funds.

...
description: It’s tough to beat Vanguard. But if anyone can do it, it might be Dodge & Cox, a boutique mutual fund company based in San Francisco.
